comments.content: Please id this script word Garden only (not the sans serif).

Cooke, Nick/Olicana-Fine which has a whole bunch of open type alternatives for the /d.  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/g-type/olicana/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150130042710/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/g-type/olicana/)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150130042710im_/http:/typophile.com/files/garden1_3749.jpg)

It's Rough actually: [http://www.g-type.com/olicana-font](http://web.archive.org/web/20150130042710/http:/www.g-type.com/olicana-font "http://www.g-type.com/olicana-font") with Swash and Ligatures activated. Very rare that it's used properly without some cack-handed 'improvement'/alteration.

Thanks Nick. I appreciate your post.  
This is from the British Country Living magazine, they use it frequently.
You're welcome Mara. Oh really? I hadn't seen that one, I must look out for it next time I'm in W H Smiths.
